morale.name: Morale Check
morale.description: Monsters and NPCs roll Morale Checks. Anyone needing to make a saving throw vs. an ongoing effect does so now.

movement.name: Movement
movement.description: Characters who choose to move do so now.

missile.name: Missile Combat
missile.description: Characters using missile and thrown weapons make their attacks.

magic.name: Magic
magic.description: Characters casting spells or using magic items do so now.

melee.name: Hand-to-Hand Combat
melee.description: Characters fighting hand-to-hand make their attacks.

nothing.name: Nothing
nothing.description: Character does absolutely nothing this round. No move, no attack, no nothing.

moveOnly.name: Move Only
moveOnly.description: Character is moving and not attacking this round. This is not a 'Retreat'.

readyWeapon.name: Ready Weapon
readyWeapon.description: Character is readying their weapon this round. They may also move at normal speed.

throw.name: Throw
throw.description: Character throws a suitable weapon, applying Dexterity and magic bonuses to the attack roll and Strength and magic bonuses to damage, provided the target is within range.

fire.name: Fire/Shoot
fire.description: Character uses a ranged weapon, applying Dexterity and magic bonuses to the attack roll, provided the target is within the weapon’s range.

spell.name: Cast Spell
spell.description: Character casts a memorized spell. Monsters use this action for magical attacks that aren't ranged or melee.

magicItem.name: Magic Item
magicItem.description: Character activates a non-weapon magical item, such as a potion, wand, ring, or the passive ability of another magical item.

attack.name: Attack
attack.description: Character makes a melee attack, adding Strength and magic bonuses to both the attack roll and damage.

withdrawal.name: Withdrawal
withdrawal.description: Character backs away from an enemy at 5 feet per round, attacking only if the enemy follows and moves into range during its movement phase.

retreat.name: Retreat
retreat.description: Character flees from melee at more than half their speed, losing shield AC bonuses and giving enemies a +2 bonus to attack them in that round.

lance.name: Lance Attack
lance.description: Character on charging mount performs a lance attack, gaining Strength and magic bonuses and dealing double damage if the mount charges at least 20 yards.

multiAttack.name: Multi-Attack
multiAttack.description: Character makes multiple attacks per round, which can include any combination of attacks, throws, disarms, or lance attacks.

setSpear.name: Set vs Charge
setSpear.description: Character braces a spear, pike, or similar weapon against a charging enemy, gaining Strength and magic bonuses and dealing double damage on a successful hit.

smash.name: Smash
smash.description: Character makes a powerful attack with a -5 penalty to the attack roll; if it hits, they add their full Strength score, along with Strength and magic bonuses, to the weapon's normal damage.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: Character blocks incoming melee and thrown attacks for an entire round, causing all enemies to take a -4 penalty on their attack rolls against them.

disarm.name: Disarm
disarm.description: Character disarms an opponent by hitting without damage; if the target fails a Dexterity check, they drop their weapon.

Encumbrance.Hint: Enable automatic tracking of encumbrance and the application of status effects for characters carrying too much.
Encumbrance.Name: Encumbrance Tracking

EncMax.Hint: The maximum amount a character may carry, in coins, and still be able to move.
EncMax.Hint2: The maximum amount, in coins, that can be carried while still able to move.
EncMax.Name: Encumbrance Max

Theme.Hint: Dark mode features a dark backround with light text and light mode features a light background with dark text.
Theme.Name: Theme

max.name: Max. Move Speed
max.hint: The maximum distance this being can move per turn.

maxFlight.name: Max. Flight Speed
maxFlight.hint: The maximum distance this being can fly per turn.

rest.name: Rest Turns
rest.hint: Configure how often a party must rest while exploring. A value of 6 would mean the party must rest once every six turns. Set to 0 for no resting required.

formula.name: Initiative Formula
formula.hint: Define the formula used to calculate initiative.

mode.name: Initiative Mode
mode.hint: Choose between group-based or individual-based initiative. Individual (simplified) mode orders solely by initiative roll plus any modifiers. Individual mode adds the 2-handed weapon rule, making 2-handed weapon users lose initiative. Individual (combat checklist) mode combines individual initiative with the combat checklist order when declared actions are enabled. Group (combat checklist) mode groups combatants by token disposition and also sorts within a group by the declared action, if declared actions are enabled. Group (hybrid individual) mode is like the group mode, but adds 2-handed weapon rule within a group's inner sort.

modifier.name: Group Initiative Modifier
modifier.hint: Choose how to calculate the group initiative modifier.

nextRound.name: Initiative Next Round Mode
nextRound.hint: Decide what will occur when the next round is activated in the combat tracker..

abilities.name: Abreviated ability names.
abilities.hint: Use abbreviations for character sheet abilities score labels.

saves.name: Short saving throw names.
saves.hint: Use short names for saving throws on the character sheet.

collapseState.name: Remember Collapse State
collapseState.hint: When enabled, the item lists will remember their collapse state individually for each character.

logChanges.name: Log Character Sheet Changes
logChanges.hint: If enabled, logs character sheet changes to the GM via chat.

weaponMastery.name: Weapon Mastery
weaponMastery.hint: If enabled, weapon mastery rules will be used.
